contest-event.event-date:
June 27, 1874 D Huddersfield Contest (1800s)
Huddersfield North Ward Conservative Association Contest 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest
huddersfield-contest
Rifle Field, Greenhead Lane, Huddersfield Contest promoted by the North Ward Conservative Association
Prizes: £30, £20, £12, £8, £4
12 bands entered, 8 competed
Cornet solo prize (£10) won by J. Paley (Saltaire)
Oct. 24, 2012, 11:04 p.m. Oct. 24, 2012, 11:13 p.m.
1 Meltham and Meltham Mills Band John Gladney Jnr Robert le Diable [arr. Smythe]
2 Linthwaite Silver Band Edwin Swift Reminiscences of Meyerbeer [unknown arranger]
3 Stalybridge Old Band James Briggs Stiffelio [arr. Gladney]
4 Buttershaw Mills (Bradford) Henry Jackson Der Freischütz [unknown arranger]
5 Holme Mills J. M. Sykes The Robbers
Unknown Result Mirfield Silver Unknown
Unknown Result Saltaire Band Unknown
Unknown Result West Vale Works Band (Greetland) Unknown
Withdrawn Dewsbury Band Unknown
Withdrawn Holme Bridge Unknown
